Title: Peace Hame!
Description:
['A second year high school student and a Kendo club member, Tamao Tsukamu, admires his senpai, the club captain, Kiritani Konome.', '
', '
', '
', '
One fateful day, she asks him for a favor involving making special kinds of photos for the student graduation album.']
